label: Account Management
definition: Purposes associated with management of accounts in relation to financial services

label: Anti Money Laundering Compliance
definition: Purposes associated with compliance assessment, documentation, and reporting activities in relation to anti-money laundering legislations for financial services

label: Anti-Money Laundering Management
definition: Purposes associated with discovery, handling, prediction, and assessment of anti-money laundering activities in relation to financial services

label: Budget Planning Assistance
definition: Purposes associated with planning of budgets, spending, and related activities in relation to financial services

label: Credit Checking
definition: Purposes associated with maintaining, evaluating, and related activities in relation to calculation of credit scores and related metrics within financial services

label: Credit History Evaluation
definition: Purposes associated with evaluation and assessment of credit history in relation to financial services

label: Credit Limit Determination
definition: Purposes associated with determination and calculation of credit limits in relation to financial services

label: Credit Score Evaluation
definition: Purposes associated with evaluation and calculation of credit scores in relation to financial services

label: Customer Due Diligence
definition: Purposes associated with compliance assessment, documentation, and reporting activities in relation to customer due diligence legislations for financial services

label: Debt Management
definition: Purposes associated with management of debt in relation to financial services

label: Expense Management
definition: Purposes associated with management of expenses and related activities in relation to financial services

label: Financial Service Management
definition: Purposes associated with management of financial services

label: Fraud Management
definition: Purposes associated with management of fraud, including fraud prevention and detection, in relation to financial services

label: Identity Fraud Management
definition: Purposes associated with discovery, handling, prediction, and assessment of identity frauds in relation to financial services

label: Instability Risk Assessment

label: Insurance Coverage Assessment

label: Insurance Eligibility Assessment
definition: Purposes associated with assessment of elibility for receiving or continuing to receive insurance

label: Insurance Fraud Management
definition: Purposes associated with fraud prevention and detection related to insurance

definition: Purposes associated with identity fraud prevention and detection related to insurance

label: Insurance Management
definition: Purposes associated with management of insurance

label: Insurance Personalised Pricing Management
definition: Purposes associated with the use of personalisation in determination, optimisation, and other processes related to pricing of insurance premiums

definition: Purposes associated with determination, optimisation, and other processes related to pricing of insurance premiums

definition: Purposes associated with conducting risk assessments in the context of insurance services

label: Phishing Attack Management

label: Product Recommendation

label: Regulatory Compliance
definition: Purposes associated with regulatory compliance assessment, documentation, and reporting activities in relation to financial services

label: Service Improvement
